coded_answer.p: I am writing to reply to yourthe letter you wrote to me on 10 June.

Firstly, I would like to tell you, that the group has been booked into the Palace Hotel, which locatesis located beside the congress house in the centre. You can make contact with Mrs Brackenbury using the number 06 8793888. Secondly, the best way to get from the hotel to the conference is to take the bus, which ishas been specially organized by us. The bus leaves at 8:00 every morning and gets back to the hotel at 6 o'clock in the evening. OffOf course there's also a bus number 8number 8 bus, in front of the hotel, which is also suitable, but it leaves only every half an hour.

The end-of-conference party, which happenswill be in the evening on 20 June, is going to be held on the coast. Beside the barbecue, there arewill be some well-known student bands from our country are performingplayingplaying music through the whole night. What's more is, that there's a Latin music band coming to make the party more colourful. It playswill play from 10:00 to 11:00, while the students can enjoy it with dancing. The main events of the party will end upbe at about 12:30 in the night. As you see, what to wear is just something casual.
Finally, inon the last afternoon, we could visit the museums, and markets (we have a very interesting robot-market). Basically it's a free time for the students to look round here by themselves.
I hope your questions rearehave been answered appropriatlyappropriately.
I'm looking forward to seeing you onat the conference.

Now-a-dayNowadays computercomputers can be found in almost every corner, in offices, in shops. Or evenEven in cars and washmachineswashing machines there're computer chipsThere're even computer chips in cars and washing machines. What hasHow have computercomputers affected to our life?

First of all, the efficiency of the society has been improved. When shopping, we don't need to wait for the Kassecashier to take every article's note by hand. When booking aana airlineflight, we can just simplyjust make a phonephone call to any agency, and get it done in one minute. Secondly, instead of looking up tons of books to get the information whatthat we need, we can very easily search for it fromon the internetInternet or on the local network. It's a very often heard, that someone, who has a specialrare illness, getshashas had an operationsoperation byat a foreign institutesinstitute, which he findfound via the internetInternet. Moreover, with computer networknetworks, it can beis possible thatfor people workto work from home, making projects, controlingcontrolling operations or having conferences. Lastly the way of communications has been alsoalso been changedalso changed. Instead of the tranditionaltraditional telecommunicationtelecommunications, we can talk by, maile-mail or even see each other with the help of a computer network.

Of course there're also some aspects in which the computer technology needneeds to be improved. For example, reading on the screen is still not as comfortable as reading on paperspaper. A very important and severe problem is the reliability and security. Till nowSo far, to completely rely on computercomputers is still somehow not safe enoughit is still somehow not safe enough to completely rely on computers.
In conclusion, computercomputers have become a very essential necessity ofin our life, and it's still a young invention, which needneeds to be improved.
